attributes.action: use the additional taxation announced(6th December 2006) on airline flights(£5per flight) to fund or research alternative sources of energy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basically the idea is that the money raised should be ringed fenced for a specific objective rather than just go into general treasury funds. 

By ring fencing it for this purpose the tax will be 'green' not just in the sense that it is punative tax on a polluting means of travel but that the money will be used to fund 'greener' fuels in the future.

This will should aid British science/industry.

Just a point to note, I don't consider myself particularily 'green' but I would like the money used for research into alternative sources of energy. I'm not pushing any particular source of energy. I don't claim to be an expert on the subject.
